name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Implementation Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in leveraging **JavaScript**, **APIs**, and **Cloud** technologies, particularly **AWS** and **GCP**, to create efficient and scalable solutions for diverse industries. I excel in web analytics, utilizing tools like **Adobe Analytics**, **Google Ads**, and **Amazon Quicksight** to deliver actionable insights and drive digital marketing strategies. My technical acumen includes experience with **Tealium**, **Salesforce**, and integration platforms like **Workato**, allowing me to facilitate seamless interactions across systems.
In addition to my implementation skills, I have built high-performance solutions within healthcare and financial sectors using **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I possess a strong foundation in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, ensuring robust and compliant applications that adhere to standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. My background in machine learning encompasses developing and deploying ML pipelines, utilizing tools like **MLflow** and **Kubeflow**, supported by a proven ability to solve complex problems and communicate effectively across teams.
